content: next st yo and draw lp of the triple crochet and are also called double-triple and through st yo insert hook into next st yo and draw lp triple-triple stitches quadruples start with 3 yos pentuples through yo and pull through all 4 lps on hook on the start with 4 yos and both are completed in the same following row insert hook under extra loop and into fashion as triples **yo draw through 2 lps on hook ** stitch repeat between ** until only 1 lp remains on the hook gauge swatch base - db-chain 20 turn row 1 - chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of the next 20 chain turn row 2 - chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of next 20 sts turn row 3 to 20 - repeat row 2 4 inches = 14 sts = 16 row instructions instructions correspond to hip measurements as follows 33 35 37 39 41 44 46 48 all sizes base chain - db-chain 96 104 112 120 128 136 144 152 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring making certain there are no twists in the chain mark last db-chain round 1 right side - ch1 1 single_crochet into each of the next 96 104 112 120 128 136 144 152 stitches join with a slip_stitch turn sizes 33 35 37 39 rnds 2 to 16 - repeat round 1 sizes 42 44 46 48 rnds 2 to 18 - repeat round 1 all sizes round 1 - mark this row and restart row count beginning with this row chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of the next 15 17 19 21 23 25 27 29 stitches 2 single_crochet into next stitch 1 single_crochet into each of the next 80 86 92 98 104 110 116 122 stitches join with a slip_stitch turn round 2 - chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of the next 64 70 round 3 - chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of the next 15 17 76 82 88 94 100 106 stitches 2 single_crochet into next 19 21 23 25 27 29 stitches 2 single_crochet into next stitch 1 single_crochet into each of the next 32 34 36 38 stitch 1 single_crochet into each of the next 82 88 84 100 40 42 44 46 stitches join with a slip_stitch turn 106 112 118 124 stitches join with a slip_stitch turn 6 © josi hannon madera round 4 - chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of the next 64 70 for all sizes 76 82 88 94 100 106 stitches 2 single_crochet into next round 1 - mark this row and restart row count stitch 1 single_crochet into each of the next 34 36 38 40 beginning with this row chain 1 1 single_crochet into each of the 42 44 46 48 stitches join with a slip_stitch turn next 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 stitches 1 ds over round 5 -
